Class Button

java.lang.Object
GUIElements.GUIElement
GUIElements.Button

extends GUIElement
implements ActionCreator

  • Constructor Details

    • Button

      public Button​(int x, int y, int w, int h, Text text, java.lang.Boolean mustDrawBox, java.awt.Color color)
      Constructor of the Button class.
      Parameters:
      x - - x coordinate of this Button
      y - - y coordinate of this Button
      w - - width of this Button
      h - - height of this Button
      text - - content of this Button
      mustDrawBox - - boolean: if true, a surrounding box will be drawn
      color - - Color: color of this Button

    • Button

      public Button​(int x, int y, Text text, java.lang.Boolean box, java.awt.Color color)
      Constructor of the Button class. draws a button surrounding given box
      Parameters:
      x - - x coordinate of this Button
      y - - y coordinate of this Button
      text - - content of this button
      box - - boolean to draw or not draw a surrounding box
      color - - the inner color of the button
